item.title: Need help on codding - REward
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

i want to make it so when i spawn a object it get safed in the file Pohs

so how do i use the public void with a case ? ( see Code2 ) becaus thats how i want to spawn objects

  1. PLEAS DONT SPAM THIS TOPIC
  2. ONLY ANSWER IF YOU THINK YOU KNOW
  3. TY

[code] public void addMember(String objectid, String face, String type) {
try {
BufferedWriter bufferedwriter;
bufferedwriter = null;
bufferedwriter = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/writed/pohs.txt", true));
bw.write((new StringBuilder()).append(“makeGlobalObject(”).append(absX).append(",").append(absY).append(",").append(objectid).append(",").append(face).append(",").append(type).append(");").toString());
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();

} catch(IOException e) {
}
}[/code]

code2:

[code] case 28164://quest 1
if(playerLevel[19] >= 1)
{
addMember();
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY-1,823,1,10);
sendMessage(“You Construct A dummy”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
actionTimer = 20;
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[19]), 19);
}
else if(playerLevel[19] < 1){
sendMessage(“Get your construction up more!!”);
}

	break;[/code]

Read full topic
